title: Odd Keyrock

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Summon Spiritomb each full moon. A new player named Spiritomb will be added with a random role, but their win condition is changed to that of the Rocks. The host will play all instances of Spiritomb. You may only summon Spiritomb 108 times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You're a rock, which is a rock.
